column1: #Text=Asami says : " When I first came here , it was because I wanted to tell you face to face that I never wanted to see or hear from you again .
#Text=" Asami says : " But when I saw you , it was n't anger I felt .
#Text=You tainted our past and destroyed our future together .
#Text=" Hiroshi says : " I want to make amends .
#Text=" Asami says : " I 'm not sure I 'll ever be able to forgive you .
#Text=But that does n't mean I should n't try .
#Text=" Asami says : " I thought we could play some Pai Sho .
#Text=" Hiroshi says : " Nothing ... would make me happier .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Do n't ... torture us .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Send these three away on the next train .
#Text=Bolin and Zhu Li will be going to the reeducation camp for our most severe dissenters .
#Text=And you will continue work on the spirit - energy project , under close , armed supervision .
#Text=" Zhu Li says : " Because my only mistake was being loyal to the wrong person .

#Text=I was blindly devoted to Varrick , and I looked past all the times he ridiculed me , or ordered me around , or made me clean his disgusting feet -- -- because I thought he possessed the most brilliant mind in the world .
#Text=But when I met you , I realized I was wrong .
#Text=" Zhu Li says : " I believe in everything you 've done , and I believe in your vision .
#Text=I want to devote my life to you .
#Text=I pledge my allegiance to you , Great Uniter .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " You two could learn something from her .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Think about what you 're doing !
#Text=" Zhu Li says : " I did everything you ever asked of me , and you never appreciated it !
#Text=They 're going to sneak into Kuvira 's camp and put an end to this .
#Text=" Main Bolin Korra Suyin Beifong Varrick Zhu Li Antagonists Baatar Jr. .
